headings: Develop a deeper understanding of U.S. criminal justice policy and procedure.
Admission Requirements, Degree Plan and Courses
What Can You Do With a Master’s Degree in Criminal Justice?
Why Earn My Criminal Justice Master’s Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: Our criminal justice graduate program will prepare you to start or advance your career in a wide variety of local, state and federal agencies. The immersive degree plan covers everything from drug and human trafficking, cybercrime and digital forensic investigations - to terrorism and homeland security, justice administration, the role of police in society and much more.

You can also take advantage of our comprehensive collection of digital journals, books and government documents relating to all facets of criminal justice policy, leadership and research. Plus, since this degree is offered completely online, you can access our award-winning program from anywhere in the world.

Our faculty have professional experience in a wide variety of criminal justice fields, including the prison and corrections system, police investigations, state and international law enforcement, and international relations. They also stay up to date with current trends and issues throughout the criminal justice system.
Plus, their dedication to providing you with the best possible online learning experience is a primary reason our program has become one of the top online criminal justice degrees in Texas.
Tuition & FeesWe don’t sacrifice quality for affordability. Angelo State is committed to helping you achieve your educational goals with as little debt as possible.

ASU Distinguished Graduate ScholarshipsEarn our premier graduate scholarship based on your highest degree GPA. Once you are admitted to an ASU graduate program, you will automatically be considered. No application is necessary.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.

Start or advance your career as soon as you graduate. With the increasing complexity and growth of the U.S. criminal justice system, our graduates can expect to find ample career opportunities in law enforcement, the court and corrections systems, government and corporate investigations, victim and child advocacy, and education.

Our 100% online degree program is open to anyone with a bachelor’s degree, regardless of your major. The GRE test is not required for admission, and a thesis is not required to complete your degree. Our classes are offered in five 8-week terms each year, so you have five possible start dates, and you can complete your degree in as little as 12 months.

Our online master’s in criminal justice program has continually been ranked among the best and most affordable in the nation by multiple online higher education guides, including Intelligent.com, GradSchoolHub.com and many others.

Angelo State has been designated a “Military Friendly School” by VIQTORY Media and G.I. Jobs magazine. We have also been named a Top 10 “Best for Vets College” by the Military Times. Our VETS Center is here to help you with your military education benefits, andTA Scholarshipsare available to help offset the cost of your tuition.

Whether you’re pursuing a master’s degree, doctoral degree or certificate/certification, you have access to all the services in ourCollege of Graduate Studies and Research. You’ll find information and resources for everything from registering for classes and writing a thesis – to available graduate/teaching assistantships and graduate research opportunities.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
